attributes.action: ensure all disgraced MP's resign immediately and not wait until the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition to let all Government know that we will not tolerate MP's resigning at the next general election in order to receive even more handouts. They must go now.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
